title: AdventHealth | A Leader in Whole-Person Health Care
description: At AdventHealth, we don't just believe in whole-person health care. We live it. And with our advanced medical treatments and expansive network of care behind you, so can you.
cleaned_text: One Purpose No matter what brings you in, no matter which of our providers, facilities, or medical services you need, we're all connected by more than just our name. We're connected by our commitment to your whole-person health. Find World-Class Care Close to Home With locations across the country, our nationally recognized network offers a wide range of services, including primary care, specialty care, urgent care, imaging, rehabilitation, home care and much more. You'll find experts with the skill to heal and the compassion to care for you like family — all close to home. Discover Care for the Whole You - Whole-Person Care You're more than flesh and bone. That's why we're here to support all of you, from everyday wellness and preventive health care to lifesaving diagnostic services and innovative medical treatments in cancer, cardiac care, orthopedics and more. - Healing Hands and Servant Hearts Across the nation, we have more than 83,000 team members who are united by a shared focus on whole-person health and a commitment to Extending the Healing Ministry of Christ. - Thousands of Open Doors Whatever you need, we have a place for you. Our integrated health care network serves neighbors across nine states with 51 hospitals and more than 1,200 care sites like emergency rooms, urgent care centers, home health and hospice agencies and medical office buildings. So You Can Heal Faster And Live Better - Advancing Medicine Through Technology From our collaborations with world leaders in medical technology to our state-of-the-art facilities, we push the boundaries of health care innovation so your body can push the boundaries of healing. - Designing Better Patient Experiences Shorter wait times. Easy access and online scheduling. Better education. We know the patient experience is about much more than providing expert medical services. That's why we're always looking for ways to take your whole experience to the next level. - Shaping The Future With Clinical Research Inside our research institutes, we're making new discoveries in medical care and giving patients renewed hope every single day. It's what makes us world leaders in clinical-trial research. Take Health Into Your Own Hands
